channel.title: 317 Items Not Dropping On Death [PI]
channel.description: Whenever I die on my RSPS, whethere it be on a admin, a normal account or anything else, it wont drop items, I can drop items and they appear on the ground, but how do I change it where when someone dies, they lose all there items, and the person who killed them gets it
